instruction: Generate a list of sentence starters to use in persuasive writing.
output:
Here is a list of sentence starters that can be used in persuasive writing:
· It is undeniable that...
· Without a doubt, it is clear that...
· It goes without saying that...
· No one can deny the fact that...
· All evidence points to the fact that...
· There is no denying that...
· The facts clearly show that...
· It is an incontestable truth that...
· Irrefutably, it can be said that...
· Undeniably, it can be seen that...
